changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, aa.id, ba.name AS base_attribute, a.name AS attribute, aa.key AS key, aa.integer_value, aa.numeric_value, aa.boolean_value, aa.text_value, aa.json_value, u.name AS unit, aa.notes, up.name AS updated_by, aa.updated, aa.version FROM attribute_meta_attribute aa JOIN attribute ba ON ba.id = aa.attribute JOIN attribute a ON aa.meta_attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON aa.unit_value = u.id JOIN agency up ON aa.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON ba.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
